title: IVariableFilletFeatureData2.CurvatureContinuous
description: Gets or sets whether to create a smoother curvature between adjacent surfaces for this variable radius fillet feature.
returns: True to make curvatures continuous, false to not
remarks:
This property supersedes any
IVariableFilletFeatureData2::ConicTypeForCrossSectionProfile
setting. Curvature continuous fillets are smoother than standard fillets because there is no jump in curvature at the boundary.
